questions.question: What is the purpose of region proposals in R-CNN?
options: Suggest a small set of candidate boxes likely to contain objects.

questions.question: Why is vanilla R-CNN slow at inference?
options: It trains one SVM per pixel.
It runs a CNN forward pass for ~2000 proposals per image (no feature sharing).
It has too many fully connected layers.

questions.question: What does the bounding box regressor in R-CNN do?
options: Chooses the best proposal per class.
Refines proposal boxes using predicted offsets (t_x, t_y, t_w, t_h).
